H0.text: Who was the 16th president of the U.S.A.,assasinated in 1865. Ulysses S. Grant

H3.text: Who was the 16th president of the U.S.A.,assasinated in 1865. A Lincoln

A4.text: Abraham Lincoln was the 16th president of the United States.

A5.text: On April 14, 1865, Lincoln was fatally shot by stage actor John Wilkes Booth at Ford's Theatre.
